title: wheres dreadnova gankplank and the warring kingdom skins ? how long before they are released  ?

replies.body: We don't have any information on new content or its release until it's been announced.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date on that.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=d5A3ykH1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-11T22:16:16.833+0000)
>
> We don't have any information on new content or its release until it's been announced.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date on that.  Hang tight!

Okay thanks. Just figured after waiting soo long for a patch you guys would have just released the skins instead of making us wait even longer. Been waiting I cant even tell you how many years for a decent GP skin cant wait to start grinding out some ranked with my fav pirate all updated and sparkly.

We don't know exactly when the skins come out but they should be out sometime during patch 7.1

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
